critique: The document aims to instill confidence and security by stabilizing the economy during wartime. It seeks to minimize fear and disgust related to economic instability and profiteering. It also attempts to inspire a sense of joy and surprise by ensuring fair prices and wages, while acknowledging the sadness associated with wartime sacrifices. The initial scores reflect these intentions, but the revised scores adjust the intensity based on a closer reading of the text, emphasizing the focus on preventing negative emotions rather than actively promoting positive ones.
